name: CART
description: The association with your shopping cart.

name: CATEGORY_INFO
description: Allows pages to be displayed more quickly.

name: COMPARE
description: The items that you have in the Compare Products list.

name: CUSTOMER
description: An encrypted version of your customer id.

name: CUSTOMER_AUTH
description: An indicator if you are signed into the store.

name: CUSTOMER_INFO
description: An encrypted version of the customer group you belong to.

name: CUSTOMER_SEGMENT_IDS
description: Stores your Customer Segment ID

name: EXTERNAL_NO_CACHE
description: A flag that, indicates whether caching is on or off.

name: FRONTEND
description: Your session ID on the server.

name: GUEST-VIEW
description: Allows guests to edit their orders.

name: LAST_CATEGORY
description: The last category you visited.

name: LAST_PRODUCT
description: The last product you looked at.

name: NEWMESSAGE
description: Indicates whether a new message has been received.

name: NO_CACHE
description: Indicates whether it is allowed to use cache.

name: PERSISTENT_SHOPPING_CART
description: A link to information about your cart and viewing history if you have asked the site.

name: RECENTLYCOMPARED
description: The items you recently compared.

name: STF
description: Information on products you emailed to friends.

name: STORE
description: The store view or language you have selected.

name: USER_ALLOWED_SAVE_COOKIE
description: Indicates whether a customer authorized cookies.

name: VIEWED_PRODUCT_IDS
description: The products that you recently looked at.

name: WISHLIST
description: An encrypted list of products added to your wish list.

name: WISHLIST_CNT
description: The number of items in your wish list.
